Activity: Arrive at the office. Review emails and respond to any inquiries from @itpm-1 or @clinlead-1 regarding the EHR vendor meeting.
Based on the EHR vendor feedback, start exploring potential alternative integration strategies if the primary approach is deemed infeasible or too costly.
Consult with @ehrdev-2 (EHR Integration Developer) to discuss the technical feasibility of different integration options. @PEOPLE: ehrdev-2; Topic: Technical Feasibility of Integration Options
Research and evaluate different middleware options for data transformation and integration. Website Browsing: MuleSoft, Apache Camel.
Document the pros and cons of each integration option, considering cost, timeline, complexity, and scalability. Loaf around browsing the internet.
Lunch Break. Read up on RESTful APIs.
Prepare a presentation summarizing the integration options for @itpm-1 and @clinlead-1, highlighting the recommended approach and potential risks.
Present the integration options to @itpm-1 and @clinlead-1 and answer their questions. Obtain their feedback and approval on the chosen approach.
Update the technical specification document to reflect the chosen integration approach and any feedback from @itpm-1 and @clinlead-1.
Begin developing a proof-of-concept (POC) to test the feasibility of the chosen integration approach. Set up the development environment and configure the necessary tools.
Check emails. Prepare for tomorrow's POC development.
